name: beerpair-launch
brand: BeerPair - AI-powered beer and food pairing app that helps craft beer lovers find the perfect pairing for any meal
target_audience: Craft beer enthusiasts, foodies, 25-45, tech-comfortable, enjoy discovering new beers

character_profiles.description: Friendly mid-30s man, short brown hair with slight stubble, wearing a casual henley or flannel shirt, approachable and enthusiastic about beer without being pretentious. Think 'your buddy who always knows which beer to order.'
character_profiles.vibe: Authentic, knowledgeable but not snobby, genuinely excited

character_profiles.description: Late 20s woman, dark wavy hair, casual-cool style (denim jacket, simple jewelry), the friend who always picks the restaurant. Genuinely curious and adventurous with food and drink.
character_profiles.vibe: Confident, exploratory, the friend everyone trusts for recommendations

scene_templates.title: The Overwhelming Choice
scene_templates.setting: Craft beer aisle in a well-stocked grocery store or bottle shop
scene_templates.action: Character stares at a massive wall of craft beers, picks up two bottles, looks confused, then pulls out phone and opens BeerPair
scene_templates.dialogue: There's like 200 options here... okay, what goes with tacos?
scene_templates.camera: Start wide to show the overwhelming selection, push in to medium close-up as they pull out phone
scene_templates.audio: Quirky indie music, subtle overwhelmed sigh, phone tap sounds

scene_templates.title: The Restaurant Save
scene_templates.setting: Trendy casual restaurant, warm lighting, menu in hand
scene_templates.action: Character scanning a beer menu looking lost, opens BeerPair, scans the food menu, gets instant pairing recommendation. Confident smile.
scene_templates.dialogue: I used to just pick the IPA every time. Now I actually know what I'm doing.
scene_templates.camera: Over-shoulder shot of menu, cut to face close-up showing the 'aha' moment
scene_templates.audio: Restaurant ambient noise, subtle satisfying chime when app shows result

scene_templates.title: The Dinner Party Hero
scene_templates.setting: Friend's dinner party, kitchen island with food spread
scene_templates.action: Character arrives with a 6-pack, friends are impressed. Quick flash of BeerPair showing the pairing. Everyone cheers.
scene_templates.dialogue: How did you know to bring a Belgian wit for the seafood?! ...I have my ways.
scene_templates.camera: Follow character entering, reaction shots of impressed friends, phone screen flash

scene_templates.title: The Discovery
scene_templates.setting: Cozy home, couch or kitchen counter with a new craft beer and food
scene_templates.action: Character opens a new beer, checks BeerPair for the perfect food match, surprised by suggestion, tries it, mind-blown reaction
scene_templates.dialogue: Stout with... chocolate cake? Okay BeerPair, I trust you... oh wow. Oh WOW.
scene_templates.camera: Close-up of app screen, cut to tasting reaction, genuine surprise
scene_templates.audio: Cozy ambient, beer pouring sound, genuine 'mmm' reaction
